version_description:
- Better game balances
- Bug fixes

- Better game balances
- Bug fixes
- Fixed area 4 boss bug
- Fixed area 4 boss bug
-Fixes for late game crashes
-Fixes for late game crashes

Changes:
- Chests are now available in the Store! They contain hero shards and other goodies.
- Quest Polish
- New Active Skill Tutorials (only if you never use skills)
- Updated Clear State
- UX Polish and updates
Fixes:
- Many key fixes
- Fix Clan Rune Donation de-syncs
- Fix Clan Objective rewarding
- Fix Clan Kick Wording
- Gameplay fixes
- Minor UI fixes

Changes:
- Chests are now available in the Store! They contain hero shards and other goodies.
- Quest Polish
- New Active Skill Tutorials (only if you never use skills)
- Updated Clear State
- UX Polish and updates
Fixes:
- Many key fixes
- Fix Clan Rune Donation de-syncs
- Fix Clan Objective rewarding
- Fix Clan Kick Wording
- Gameplay fixes
- Minor UI fixes
- Fixed localization bug for certain languages
- Fixed localization bug for certain languages
- Bug Fixes
- Bug Fixes

New Features :
- New Towers mode! This is an update to Dungeons. Each tower has it's own unique challenge and rewards!
- New Limited Time Holiday Bundle for Elf Heroes!
- New Chests are available in the Store!
- Improved Store Pop up information!
- Various UI and UX improvements!

Bug fixes :
- Changes to Game Balance
- Numerous bug fixes

- New Limited Time Holiday Bundle for Elf Heroes!
- New Chests are available in the Store!
- Improved Store Pop up information!
- Various UI and UX improvements!

New Features :

New Features:
* Improved Tutorials! Please welcome Grandpa Toots who will help new players find their way in Battle Bouncers!
* Updated Logan’s Flame Strike visuals
* Clan Chat Improvements. Now more responsive and better flow!

Bug Fixes:
* Fixed Ad behaviour for iOS devices
* Lightning Conductor will hit Transmuted targets properly
* Various other minor fixes

New Features:
* Improved Tutorials! Please welcome Grandpa Toots who will help new players find their way in Battle Bouncers!
* Updated Logan’s Flame Strike visuals
* Clan Chat Improvements. Now more responsive and better flow!

Bug Fixes:
* Fixed Ad behaviour for iOS devices
* Lightning Conductor will hit Transmuted targets properly
* Various other minor fixes

New Features:
* New Area 8! Once you beat Area 7-30, it will be available!
If you have already completed 7-30, please complete it again.
* New Heroic Area 5! Once you beat Heroic Area 4-20, it will be available!
If you have already completed Heroic 4-20, please complete it again.
* Tower Re-balance. All your previous progress with Towers has been reset to account for the new Tower Balance.
You will receive Diamonds in your mailbox to reward you for your previous progress!
* New Progressive Bundle Available! Login every day to get better and better rewards.Changes:
* Bug fixes
* General panel and button improvements

New Features:
* New Area 8! Once you beat Area 7-30, it will be available!
If you have already completed 7-30, please complete it again.
* New Heroic Area 5! Once you beat Heroic Area 4-20, it will be available!
If you have already completed Heroic 4-20, please complete it again.
* Tower Re-balance. All your previous progress with Towers has been reset to account for the new Tower Balance.
You will receive Diamonds in your mailbox to reward you for your previous progress!
* New Progressive Bundle Available! Login every day to get better and better rewards.Changes:
* Bug fixes
* General panel and button improvements

mproved UI and visuals on numerous panels
Players will have the ability to refresh all Tower Attempts, once, for Diamonds
New Hero Rarity system
Improved stage design for some early stages
Numerous bug fixes

mproved UI and visuals on numerous panels

Numerous bug fixes

Updated Rune rarities to match Hero rarities
Fixed issue with Quicksilver and Jean Active Skills
Updated translations for all languages
Re-enabled Clan Management

Updated Rune rarities to match Hero rarities
Fixed issue with Quicksilver and Jean Active Skills
Updated translations for all languages
Re-enabled Clan Management

Changes:
New Epic Hero - Spectre, The Night Stalker! Check out our subreddit for more details.
Updated Video Chest rewards and Flow! Up to 3 levels of increasing rewards.
Updated Bundles and improved how we show what’s inside!
Updated Audio from Enemy Attacks
Bug Fixes:
Fix rare bug with Lore’s Mana Stone not giving Mana
Fix for how Explosive Ball shows damage
Other minor fixes

New Features :
New Game Mode: Tournaments! Test your Battle Bouncer skills against players from around the world!
Please read our subreddit for more details.
New Epic Hero - Hilda, The Mystic Prodigy!
Rare Heroes Skill Rebalance and new Passives!

Improved performance when using Piercing shot
Minor localization fixes

Bug Fixes

New Features :
Improvements to how the Find Panel selects what to recommend
Improvements to the stability of Video Chests
Improvements to the Tournament Panel and Icon
Rebalance Tournament stages for a fairer experience, starting out easier but ramping up in later waves

Changes :
Epic Heroes are now using the new Passive HUD
Fixes for Dwarven Defender’s and Lightning Blade’s Skill Info

New Heroes:
Citadel, The Holy Knight
Tilt, The Arcane Machine
New Enemy
Hot Head found Area 1New Boss:
Bomb Shell found Area 4 and Area 8
Balance Changes:
Fauna added to Tower Token Shop
Garnet added to Clan Token Shop
Bug Fixes:
Experience Potions used when levelling up a Hero now displays 4 digits
Eden's Mana Burst Active Skill will now correctly destroy enemies who are low enough health even if they take reduced damage
Ghosts will no longer incorrectly appear intangible when they are tangible

Exchange excess Hero Shards for Shard Dust

Tournament Tier 14
Improved Clan Interface

Wiz, The Enchanting Automaton

Bull Knight found in Area 2
Chain Chump found in Area 3

New Game Mode: Gauntlet!
Take on a new series of challenging stages daily and collect fabulous rewards! - New stage hazards like Mana Burn and Cursed Idol! - Purchase power-ups from Merchants and find amazing rewards in the Treasure Vault!
New stage hazards like Mana Burn and Cursed Idol!
Purchase power-ups from Merchants and find amazing rewards in the Treasure Vault!
Feature Improvements:
Improvements to Clan Settings, Rune Requests / Donations, and the Shop
Bug Fixes:
Fix for a crash when Yarrow died while collecting an ingredient

New Features:
- Free Bundles
Bug Fixes:
- Meteor Rain will now correctly target highest health non-block Enemies
- Fiery Fallout will now be able to damage mana blocks created by Transmute
- Tidal Wave will now be able to be retriggered if it was active at the end of the previous stage
- Progression Quests with Hero Shard rewards will display the amount
- Various UI Improvements to Special Offers screen
- Various UI Improvements to Event screens
- Other various bug fixes and stability fixes
